issue.title: For J3.6.x : Tooltips
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We have to uniformize the tooltips for Joomla 3.6, the hasTip, hasTooltip and hasPopover classes...

comments.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

OK, this commit in Joomla had the behavior changed : https://github.com/joomla/joomla-cms/commit/90db0ff21de2ffbc832cd4cdfa8c776bb1e7a78e
Now if the title differs from the text of the tooltip, it uses *hasPopover* instead of *hasTooltip*.

* When creating fields "the Joomla way" (form XML) a _hasPopover_ is produced.
* Other tootltips handmade in easySDI are simple _hasTip_

The result is that in the components we have the two types on tooltips, with different looks.
